title: Abyssal Scepter getting the Black Cleaver Treatment

embed.description: Tonight's red post collection includes noting Abyssal Scepter changes will be on the PBE soon, with context on the PBE Riven R missile speed nerf, on the upcoming "Instant Feedback System", and more! Continue reading for more information!

body: So if you haven't heard, Riot Reinboom posted that they are planning Abyssal Scepter changes for the next PBE cycle which is coming next week. The change is targeted toward as she puts it, AP tanks and AP bruisers, similar to how BC was targeted for AD tanks and bruisers. What do you guys think? Depending on the changes, who do you think will benefit the most from a better Abyssal Scepter?

I'm actually not a fan of this. Not at all. Abyssal is actually a fairly good item on several midlane mages. Currently it provides AP, MR against assassins, and magic pen (essentially) which is extremely useful against in the tank meta. I would argue these are three of the most important stats for an ap mid. Turning this into a tank item is not what a midlane mage wants at all. Why not create a new item for tanks and turn the abyssal scepter into a better mid item? We need more items anyway. Itemization is way to limited.
Considering the success of the BC changes, I'm confident Abyssal will be good. And Reinboom said they would compensate mages with an alternative MR item.
